name: web_search
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool web_search_v2.
Tool description: Web Search API. Search the web pages from billions of results. Related keywords, knowledge panel and more.
API description: Performs a web search using the specified query and optional parameters.

query.description:
Search query. You can use web search parameters.

e.g. `ronaldo site:instagram.com`
e.g. `twitter filetype:pdf`
e.g. `inurl:market`

related_keywords.description: If specified, includes related keywords in the search results. This may increase API latency. Default is None.

limit.description: The maximum number of search results to return. The maximum recommended value is 300. Default is 10.
